title: FTX's downfall and Binance's consolidation: the fragility of Centralized Digital Finance. (arXiv:2302.11371v2 [q-fin.GN] UPDATED)
abstract: This paper investigates the causes of the FTX digital currency exchange's failure in November 2022. We identify the collapse of the Terra-Luna ecosystem as the pivotal event that triggered a significant decrease in the exchange's liquidity. Analysing on-chain data, we report that FTX heavily relied on leveraging and misusing its native token, FTT, and we show how this behaviour exacerbated the company's fragile financial situation. To gain further insights into the downfall, we study evolutionary dependency structures of 199 cryptocurrencies on an hourly basis, and we investigate public trades at the time of the events. Results suggest that the collapse was actively accelerated by Binance tweets causing a systemic reaction in the cryptocurrency market. Finally, identifying the actors who mostly benefited from the FTX's collapse and highlighting a generalised trend toward centralisation in the crypto space, we emphasise the importance of genuinely decentralised finance for a transparent

translated_title: FTX的崩溃和币安的巩固：中心化数字金融的脆弱性
translated_abstract: 本文研究了FTX数字货币交易所在2022年11月失败的原因。我们认为Terra-Luna生态系统的崩溃是导致该交易所流动性显著降低的关键事件。通过分析链上数据，我们报告了FTX严重依赖于借贷和滥用其原生代币FTT，并展示了这种行为如何加剧了公司脆弱的财务状况。为了进一步了解这种衰落，我们以小时为基础研究了199种加密货币的进化依赖结构，并调查了事件发生时的公共交易。结果表明，币安的推文积极加速了崩溃，引起了加密市场的系统反应。最后，本文确定了从FTX的崩溃中最受益的参与者，并强调了加密空间向中心化趋势的重要性，强调了对于透明和弹性的金融体系来说，真正分散化的金融的重要性。
tldr: 该论文研究了FTX数字货币交易所失败的原因，并指出该事件揭示了中心化数字金融系统的脆弱性和去中心化金融的重要性。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates the causes of FTX digital currency exchange's failure and highlights the fragility of centralized digital finance system and the importance of decentralized finance.
